content.text: I'm so excited for my Renaissance Faire date tonight! I bought this new outfit that I'm dying to show off.
That's awesome! I love that feeling when you get a new outfit and can't wait to wear it. I'm sure you'll look great!
Thanks, I hope so! I'm a vegetarian, but I do eat fish, especially sushi. Do you have any dietary restrictions?
No, I'm not a vegetarian. I love all kinds of food, but my favorite is probably pizza.
Oh, me too! I love pizza. I'm so glad it's a food that can be shared with everyone.
Me too! It's the perfect food for any occasion.
I know, right? So, what do you do for fun?
I love to bird watch. I live close to the coast, so there are always a lot of different birds to see.
That's really cool! I've never been bird watching before, but it sounds like it could be fun.
It's really relaxing. You just sit there and watch the birds fly around. It's a great way to clear your head.
That sounds nice. I might have to try it sometime.
I'd love to show you around sometime. There are a lot of great bird watching spots near my house.
That would be great! I'd love to see some birds.
Awesome! I'll let you know when I'm free
